title: Bard's Lost Guitar
description: The Bard at the spawn campfire has lost his guitar and needs your help. This essential quest rewards the Unknown Key, which unlocks the Fallen Angel's Cave where you can obtain the powerful Arcane Pickaxe.
objectives: Find the Bard NPC at the spawn campfire
Locate the guitar in Stonewake Mine
Find the hidden hole in a bush near Umut the Brave
Retrieve the guitar and return to the Bard

title: Goblin King (Forgotten Kingdom)
description: Challenge the Goblin King in the Forgotten Kingdom by providing escalating tributes. This advanced quest requires significant resources but grants major rewards essential for end-game progression.
objectives: Provide Third Tribute: Gold + Topaz + [Next tier gem]
Provide Fourth Tribute: Gold + Topaz + [Higher tier gem]

title: Lost Cat
description: Help Tomo find his lost cat. The cat is hidden behind a waterfall wall in the Goblin Cave. This quest teaches players to explore hidden locations and rewards valuable items.

title: Arcane Pickaxe Quest
description: Obtain the legendary Arcane Pickaxe from the Fallen Angel's Cave. First complete Bard's Lost Guitar quest to get the Unknown Key, then use it to unlock the cave and claim this powerful mining tool.
objectives: Use the Unknown Key to unlock the cave

title: Mining Master
description: Master the art of mining in The Forge. Learn to extract ores efficiently and reach deeper mining depths. Essential for gathering resources needed for forging and quests.
objectives: Mine your first ore (Stone or Coal)
Extract a rare ore (Gold or higher)

title: Forging Apprentice
description: Learn the manual forging minigame in The Forge. Master the 3-step process to craft weapons and tools from ore ingots. Essential skill for creating better equipment.

title: Race Reroll Quest
description: Learn how to reroll your race at the Wizard NPC in Stonewake's Cross. Understand the race system and find your ideal race for your playstyle. Mythical races have a 0.5% drop rate.
objectives: Reroll your race at least once

title: The Forge Master
description: The ultimate challenge in The Forge. Master all aspects of the game including mining, forging, combat, and quests. Create a Masterwork quality weapon and defeat end-game content.
objectives: Obtain all rare ores (Luminite, Adamantite, etc.)
